definition: not in public, situated or taking place in the area of a stage not visible to the audience, a stage area out of sight of the audience
details:
adverb
- not in public
= example: not in public
- behind the scenes
adjective
- situated or taking place in the area of a stage not visible to the audience
= example: situated or taking place in the area of a stage not visible to the audience
- concealed from public view or attention
= example: concealed from public view or attention
= synonyms: backstage
noun
- a stage area out of sight of the audience
= synonyms: wing
